description:
Using pop star Gokudo as bait, the gang manages to infiltrate the secret monkey encampment ruled by Gokuu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ore Saru no Mattaku Tondemonai Shoutai wa? no Koto
The True Identity of Me, I`ll Be a Monkey`s Uncle!
¿Cual es la increíble identidad de mi yo mono?
オレ猿のまったくとんでもない正体は? のこと
